lyrics:
9 contributorsbruises lyricsverse 1 patrick monahan  ashley monroe
havent seen you since high school
good to see youre still beautiful
gravity hasnt started to pull
quite yet i bet youre rich as hell
one thats five and one thats three
been two years since he left me
good to know that you got free
that town i know was keeping you down on your knees

chorus patrick monahan  ashley monroe
these bruises make for better conversation
loses the vibe that separates
its good to let you in again
youre not alone in how youve been
everybody loses we all got bruises
we all got bruises

verse 2  patrick monahan  ashley monroe both
have you seen him not in years
how about her no but i hear
shes in queens with the man of her dreams
funny back then she said that about you
que sera youll never guess who i saw
remember johnny b
remember him we were best friends practically
lets do this soon again ten years is that what its been
cant believe how time flies by
leaving you makes me wanna cry
see train liveget tickets as low as 24you might also likechorus patrick monahan  ashley monroe
these bruises make for better conversation
loses the vibe that separates
its good to let you in again
youre not alone in how youve been
everybody loses we all got bruises
we all got bruises

bridge patrick monahan  ashley monroe both
i would love to fix it all for you
i would love to fix you too
please dont fix a thing whatever you do

breakdown patrick monahan
these bruises make for better conversation
loses the vibe that separates
its good to know youve got a friend
but you remember now and then
everybody loses

chorus patrick monahan  ashley monroe both
these bruises make for better conversation
loses the vibe that separates
its good to let you in again
youre not alone in how youve been
everybody loses
everybody loses
everybody loses
we all got bruises
we all got bruises
we all got bruises2embed
